About the Company: Regency Trust Ltd is a non-banking finance company registered with the Reserve Bank of India, which does not accept deposits from the public. The business activities of the company include corporate leasing and hire purchase, leasing, bill discounting, and trading. The companys interest lies in the retail financing sector with special focus on the east.The trading business revolves around electronics and computer hardware.
